item.title: Comment on Letters of recommendation by MikeP
item.description:
Finally, we examine early career outcomes and find that letter characteristics, especially a “top” recommendation have meaningful effects on initial job placements and journal publications.

Not effects. Correlations. The word is correlations.

Also, there should be a comma after 'recommendation'.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/letters-of-recommendation.html?commentID=160823045

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/letters-of-recommendation.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=letters-of-recommendation

Votes: 49⬆ 7⬇
item.dc:creator: MikeP

item.title: Comment on Letters of recommendation by JP
item.description:
It was common in my department to write your own letter of recommendation and for the faculty member to review it before submission. How do you control for that?

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/letters-of-recommendation.html?commentID=160823043
